body: Hi Ejnar, You are getting these strange results because of ground surface. When I disable it I get reasonable results see the image below. I suggest that you do some research on the correct properties for ground surfaces and then set the radiance material at present you are simply using the default radiance material for the ground.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EljNFT4PzFHpao9lsLXEUUMV7iGcA4PWyB*kTPFqomKpx9SxXl77CjBim1bSII5hIC-iNPr-xJhomENu6m7RhjJ7GitbQKlT/Planview.PNG)
